content.text:
## Summary
Implemented search ping-pong message handling functionality in the ccagent CLI tool to enable bidirectional WebSocket communication with the backend server. The agent now properly handles conversation start and user message flows, providing a foundation for interactive Claude Code sessions.

## Changes
- **ccagent/cmd/main.go**: Added comprehensive WebSocket client with connection retry logic, graceful shutdown handling, and message routing for conversation management
- **ccagent/cmd/messages.go**: Created message type definitions and payload structures for start conversation, user messages, and assistant responses
- **ccbackend/models/messages.go**: Established shared message protocol definitions to ensure consistency between client and server communication

The implementation includes exponential backoff retry mechanisms, proper interrupt signal handling, and structured logging throughout the message handling pipeline.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)
